posts.title: New website!
posts.summary: I made another new version of my blog. Not long since I made a big update to it. Now I used next.js. I also moved the blog to the index page so it will be more noticable.

posts.title: Images in Next.js
posts.summary: In this article we introduce adding images in the tailwind starter blog and the benefits and limitations of the next/image component.
